user_query: I want to search for a specific word in a lorem ipsum text. Can you generate a random lorem ipsum text for me? Also, I need the click-through statistics for a short URL to analyze the engagement of my social media posts.

TaskList.description: Generate a random lorem ipsum text to serve as the content for search.
Perform a search for a specific word within the generated lorem ipsum text.
Retrieve click-through statistics for the specified short URL to analyze social media engagement.
